description:
A mysterious blonde Poet who seems to be personally acquainted with both Lia de Beaumont and Durand. Despite his name, he is not the Maximilien Robespierre of the French Revolution.
[SPOILER]It is Robin who eventually becomes the Maximilien Robespierre of the French Revolution, taking the original Robespierre`s name and ideals for his own (although the dates don`t fit either: the historical Robespierre was born in 1758, five years after the events of the anime).[/SPOILER]
name: Maximilien Robespierre
